Whāngarei whānau’s despair at loss of road accident victim Jahsdis Raynard Ngaruhe’s memorial sign https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/whangarei-whanaus-despair-at-loss-of-road-accident-victim-jahsdis-raynard-ngaruhes-memorial-sign/5ACZ5Q7N6BCPHPREH33EOECVDM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/whangarei-whanaus-despair-at-loss-of-road-accident-victim-jahsdis-raynard-ngaruhes-memorial-sign/5ACZ5Q7N6BCPHPREH33EOECVDM/ Sarah CurtisA whānau is heartbroken at the loss of a roadside memorial sign.Tue, 29 Oct 2024 02:49:08 +0000 The loss of a roadside memorial sign for a 15 year-old who was struck and killed by a vehicle on Vinegar Hill Road, has been heart-breaking for his family. Pictured with the sign is his sister Violett Ngaruhe. Photo / Supplied
